name: Jun Sakuma
content: Machine Learning/Data Mining Lab at University of TsukubaWelcome to MDL WebsiteMachine Learning and Data Mining Laboratory (MDL) is affiliated with Degree Programs in Systems and Information Engineering at University of Tsukuba. Our research primarily centers on machine learning, data mining, and artificial intelligence. A central theme of our work is the trustworthiness of these techniques.Explore Our ResearchNewsJul 13, 2025Our paper has been accepted at ICML 2025Jan 22, 2025Our paper has been accepted at AISTAT 2025Nov 6, 2024Members of our laboratory delivered presentations at The 27th Information-Based Induction Sciences Workshop, 2024 (IBIS2024)Mar 4, 2024Members of our laboratory delivered presentations at Fifty-Third Information-Based Induction Sciences and Machine Learning (IBISML)Jan 23, 2024Members of our laboratory delivered presentations at Symposium on Cryptography and Information Security (SCIS2024)MDLMachine LearningData MiningLabæ¥æ¬èªHomeJoin Our LabResearchPublicationsNewsMembersContactInternal
